message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.IR. 

This paper is about natural language processing and specifically focuses on sentence simplification. The paper proposes a novel multi-task learning approach to improve the entailment and paraphrasing capabilities of a sequence-to-sequence sentence simplification model. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper introduces a multi-armed bandit based training approach, which is a reinforcement learning technique, indicating a possible fit with cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Learning). The paper also evaluates its model on multiple datasets, suggesting a potential fit with cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
